data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Murcia, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Murcia, Región de Murcia, Spain
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Murcia.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the county of Murcia an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Murcia, Región de Murcia, Spain so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Molina de Segura
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Molina de Segura, Región de Murcia, Spain.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Murcia, Región de Murcia, Spain to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 1,423,338 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Jesus, make the 1,095,122 people in the county of Murcia who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.section_summary:
the county of Murcia, Región de Murcia, Spain has a population of 1,446,500.

We estimate Murcia has 23,162 people who might know Jesus, 1,095,122 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 328,216 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 62 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 23,162 believers in Murcia to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.
